text: Comedy is
*real music*
Com-
Comedy is very subjective.
While some individuals may find a certain thing funny, comedic, or interesting,
others may look upon that same piece of content as deplorable, or really bad.
Typically, even though you yourself or me, do not find something funny,
we can at least acknowledge how other people may find it funny, and where the humor may come from.
A personal example for me, is the TV show Friends.
I did not grow up watching it, I have no nostalgic connection to it, and frankly, it does not appeal to my sense of humor.
But for me to say that Friends is not funny, is just not fair.
But I can see why people would find Friends funny.
It's endearing. It's got a cast of characters you like,
It's got relatable situations, and it's got you, the viewer at home,
rooting for people and laughing along along along the way. Long.
Let me get to my point.
Every once in a while, I come across a piece of content that is so incredibly baffling,
who its target audience is, who it was written by, and why it exists in the first place.
